meanings.sent1: The symmetricalnesses of the butterfly's wings were truly beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully painted the symmetricalnesses of the flower petals.
meanings.sent3: The symmetricalnesses of the cake layers made it look too perfect to eat.
meanings.sent4: The symmetricalnesses of the building's architecture mirrored the surrounding skyscrapers.
meanings.sent5: The symmetricalnesses of the snowflake amazed the children.

meanings.definition: The state of having balanced proportions.
meanings.sent1: Her symmetricalnesses in height and weight made her a great gymnast.
meanings.sent2: The model's symmetricalnesses were ideal for the fashion industry.
meanings.sent3: The symmetricalnesses of the twins made it hard for others to tell them apart.
meanings.sent4: The symmetricalnesses of the garden's layout created a sense of harmony.
meanings.sent5: The symmetricalnesses of the room's furniture arrangement pleased the interior designer.

meanings.definition: The property of being evenly balanced on both sides.
meanings.sent1: The symmetricalnesses of the seesaw allowed the children to play happily.
meanings.sent2: The symmetricalnesses of the scales ensured accurate measurements.
meanings.sent3: The symmetricalnesses of the tree branches provided a perfect frame for the sunset.
meanings.sent4: The symmetricalnesses of the face mask helped distribute the weight evenly.
meanings.sent5: The symmetricalnesses of the bridge's design made it both functional and beautiful.
